caption:
"A possibly metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Ambiguous function between wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in workshop environment near assembly parts."

"A glossy ceramic mug with deep blue coloring and rounded shape. Has a comfortable handle and flat base. Made for holding hot drinks. Sitting beside a coffee maker and jar of beans on a kitchen counter."

"Inconclusive evidence for the category of the object in the green bounding box. It appears to be a translucent amber-colored container-type object with fluted body shape and water droplets on surface. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby."

"The tapered rim suggests it is a glass vase-type object with translucent amber coloring. Fluted body shape and water droplets on surface. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby."

"While resembling a vase, the presence of water droplets and fluted body shape suggest it is a glass vase-type object with translucent amber coloring. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby."
